item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 05 Jul 2022
item.description:
1. An amusing use of first-class modules: reading from plaintext and compressed files
  2. TLS signature with opam:tls
  3. Open Source tooling engineer at Jane Street
  4. Dune how to define custom build task
  5. Lwt.5.6.0 (and other Lwt packages)
  6. Windows-friendly OCaml 4.12 distribution - Diskuv OCaml 0.1.0
  7. OCamlFormat Web Configurator
  8. Release of optiml-transport
